Name.BusinessNameLine1: FRIST CENTER FOR THE VISUAL ARTS INC

IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDescription: PRESENTING & ORIGINATING HIGH QUALITY VISUAL ART EXHIBITIONS WITH RELATED EDUCATIONAL PROGRAMS & COMMUNITY OUTREACH ACTIVITIES.
IRS990.MissionDescription: TO PRESENT AND ORIGINATE HIGH QUALITY EXHIBITIONS WITH RELATED EDUCATIONAL PROGRAMS AND COMMUNITY OUTREACH ACTIVITIES.
IRS990.Description: EXHIBITIONS: HOSTED TRAVELING ART EXHIBITIONS FROM THE UNITED STATES AND ABROAD, AS WELL AS INTERNAL DEVELOPMENT OF ART EXHIBITIONS ON A DIVERSE RANGE OF THEMES.

Activity2.Description: EDUCATION AND OUTREACH: OFFERED A WIDE VARIETY OF ACCESSIBLE AND AFFORDABLE PROGRAMS DESIGNED TO ASSIST PEOPLE OF ALL AGES AND BACKGROUNDS TO BECOME MORE KNOWLEDGEABLE AND APPRECIATIVE OF ART.

Activity3.Description: GIFT SHOP: OFFERED WIDE SELECTION OF ARTS & CRAFTS SUPPLIES, EDUCATIONAL MATERIALS, PUBLICATIONS, CATALOGUES AND GIFT ITEMS THAT ARE RELATED TO EXHIBITIONS & PROGRAMS. ALSO FEATURED HIGH-QUALITY ART & FINE CRAFTS OF SELECTED ARTISTS.

ContractorCompensation.DescriptionOfServices: SHIPPING AND CRATING FOR TRAVELING EXHIB

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 2
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: THE FOLLOWING TRUSTEES HAVE FAMILY RELATIONSHIPS WITH EACH OTHER: H. LEE BARFIELD II AND KARYN M. FRIST.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: A DRAFT OF FORM 990 WAS PROVIDED TO THE TRUSTEES VIA E-MAIL FOR REVIEW AND APPROVAL PRIOR TO ITS SUBMISSION TO THE INTERNAL REVENUE SERVICE.

GeneralExplanation.ReturnReference: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: EACH OFFICER AND TRUSTEE REVIEWS AND SIGNS THE CONFLICT OF INTEREST DISCLOSURE STATEMENT ANNUALLY. THE FRIST CENTER'S CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY PRESCRIBES THE PROCESS FOR DISCLOSURE OF ANY POTENTIAL CONFLICT OF INTEREST.

GeneralExplanation.ReturnReference: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: EXECUTIVE COMPENSATION IS BASED ON SATISFACTORY FULFILLMENT OF ALL ASSIGNED DUTIES AND EXPECTATIONS. THE FIGURE IS DERIVED FROM THE NATIONAL SURVEY OF COMPENSATION COMPILED ANNUALLY BY THE ASSOCIATION OF ART MUSEUM DIRECTORS. THIS ASSESSMENT PUBLISHES THE RESULTS FOR THE PREVIOUS YEAR OF SALARIES BASED ON BUDGET, GEOGRAPHICAL LOCATIONS, AND POPULATION DENSITY. FIGURES ARE AVAILABLE FROM THE HIGHEST TO LOWEST IN ALL CATEGORIES. MEMBERS OF THE HUMAN RESOURCES COMMITTEE CONSIDER THE SALARIES OF EXECUTIVE DIRECTORS OF THE SOUTHEAST, IN INSTITUTIONS WITH A BUDGET OVER $10 MILLION, IN A METROPOLITAN AREA WITH A POPULATION OF 1.5 MILLION. HISTORICALLY, THE COMMITTEE HAS AIMED TO COMPENSATE THE EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR AT THE MEDIAN TO 75TH PERCENTILE. THE EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR RECEIVES NO CAR ALLOWANCE, NO CLUB MEMBERSHIPS, NO HOUSING ALLOWANCE, NO TRAVEL FOR COMPANIONS, NO REIMBURSEMENT FOR PERSONAL SERVICES, AND NO FIRST-CLASS TRAVEL. NO OTHER OFFICERS ARE COMPENSATED.

GeneralExplanation.ReturnReference: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 18
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: THE FRIST CENTER'S FORM 990 IS AVAILABLE FOR PUBLIC INSPECTION AT WWW.GUIDESTAR.ORG. IN ADDITION, FORMS 990 AND 1023 ARE AVAILABLE FOR REVIEW UPON REQUEST.

GeneralExplanation.ReturnReference: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: THE FRIST CENTER'S AUDITED FINANCIAL STATEMENTS ARE AVAILABLE FOR PUBLIC INSPECTION AT THE ORGANIZATION'S WEBSITE, WWW.FRISTCENTER.ORG. THE ORGANIZATION DOES NOT MAKE GOVERNING DOCUMENTS OR THE CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY AVAILABLE TO THE PUBLIC.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: CHANGES IN NET ASSETS OR FUND BALANCES:
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: DONATED SERVICES AND USE OF FACILITIES: -711,204.

GeneralExplanation.ReturnReference: FORM 990, PART XI, LINE 2C, DESCRIPTION OF AUDIT COMMITTEE PROCESS:
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: THE FRIST CENTER HAS AN AUDIT COMMITTEE THAT ASSUMES RESPONSIBILITY FOR SELECTION OF THE INDEPENDENT ACCOUNTANT AND OVERSIGHT OF THE ANNUAL AUDIT. THERE WAS NO CHANGE IN THIS PROCESS FROM THE PRIOR YEAR.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: PART XI, LINE 3A, AUDITS UNDER SINGLE AUDIT ACT:
GeneralExplanation.ReturnReference: FORM 990, PART VIII, LINE 1E, GOVERNMENT GRANTS (CONTRIBUTIONS) AND
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: THE FRIST CENTER REPORTED $1,663,396 OF GOVERNMENT GRANTS ON THIS LINE, WHICH EXCEEDS THE THRESHOLD REQUIRING AN AUDIT AS SET FORTH IN THE SINGLE AUDIT ACT AND OMB CIRCULAR A-133. HOWEVER, THE GOVERNMENT GRANTS INCLUDE A NON-CASH GIFT-IN-KIND FOR INSURANCE COVERAGE, WHICH WAS SPECIFICALLY EXCLUDED FROM THE A-133 AUDIT REQUIREMENTS. THE REMAINING GOVERNMENT GRANTS ARE BELOW THE SINGLE AUDIT THRESHOLD. ACCORDINGLY, THE RESPONSE TO PART XII, QUESTION 3A IS APPROPRIATELY MARKED "NO".
